oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - 1958-07-26 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from Grand Ole Opry Show from July 26, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host, performer), Rod Brasfield (performer), Minnie Pearl (performer), Tommy Jackson (performer), Justin Tubb (performer), Chet Atkins (performer), and Stringbean (performer) on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Cowboy Copas; Rod Brasfield; Minnie Pearl; Chet Atkins; Stringbean; Tommy Jackson; Justin Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Down In Nashville Tennessee (Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas and Grant Turner introduce the line up -- Cowboy Copas introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield and Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Justin Tubb -- Justin Tubb talks about his new album -- Into Each Life Some Rain Must Fall (Justin Tubb) -- Liberty (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Cowboy Copas and Grant Turner talks -- Don't Shake Hands With The Devil (Cowboy Copas) -- Grant Turner and Cowboy Copas talk and introduce Chet Atkins -- Tiger Rag (Chet Atkins) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Minnie Pearl -- Minnie Pearl talks -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- I'd Trade All Of My Tomorrows (Justin Tubb) -- Cowboy Copas talks about introduces Stringbean -- Goodbye Liza Jane (Stringbean) -- Cowboy Copas talks about touring -- Won't You Ride In My Little Red Wagon (Cowboy Copas) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Cowboy Copas)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Copas, Cowboy; Brasfield, Rod, 1910-1958; Minnie Pearl; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996; Atkins, Chet, 1924-2001; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Tubb, Justin;
